name: Sharpshooter

skills.name: Piercing Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if the attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10'

skills.name: Double Tap
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
